name: PainTrain
description:
This game was concepted and created in 5 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

An anti tower defense game where you lead your train on the right track to avoid hazards. Complete levels to gain new allies with different abilities to defend your train.

Credits

Qiao Wang - Game Director\Producer\Designer\Programmer

Emily Dawson - Audio Composer

Daniel Eriksen - 3D Modeler Props\Texture artist

Nicholas Hernandez - Audio Sound Designer

Lifu Li - Concept Artist\UI

Linan Wang - Programmer

Michael Williams - 3D Modeler Train\Texture artist

Game Engine: Unreal engine4
